description: Egon is perhaps best known from his stint as the general manager of Stones Throw Records, his partnership with Madlib in Madlib Invazion and his role as creative director of the J Dilla Estate. He also runs label Now-Again Records, which specializes in global funk and psychedelic grooves. Catch Egon taking to the NTS airwaves to showcase a staggering archive of high quality recordsâ€¦
title: EGON
